message_1: A student has to choose 4 courses from a list of 8 courses to complete their degree. The student wants to choose the courses such that they have the highest total course grades possible. Each course has a maximum grade of 100. Given the grades for all 8 courses, what is the maximum total grade the student can achieve for their chosen 4 courses?
message_2: To find the maximum total grade the student can achieve for their chosen 4 courses, we need to know the individual grades for all 8 courses. Please provide the grades for each of the 8 courses.
